name: Unpopulated
description:
Welcome to the lands of  Nilandra, where you and your best friend are hired by the king to keep the lands safe at all costs. Run, slash, and talk your way through most places as you try to uncover what's happening. You will face many challenges as you trudge through this short rpg. Will you end up doing whatever you can to keep the lands safe? Or will you eventually hang up your sword and shield to signify you're done. This game is still in small development, however this may also end up being the final state of the game.

This is the first game ever made by Purple Gardevoir (YT Link: https://www.youtube.com/@purplegardevoir2654 ) And any support is greatly appreciated. This game was made in 20 hours with RPG Maker MV.
